live_updates: Work to restore services continues. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52018.summary: Some customers in British Columbia are experiencing an slow speeds when connecting to Shaw WiFi Access Points. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52018.title: July 30 – British Columbia| WiFi Access Points - Outage (Fix in Progress)
